EmailTemplate.name: Airline Monthly Statistic Report
EmailTemplate.subject: Airline Monthly Statistic Report_Dec 09_
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir or Madam,
Please find attached the November 09 Statistic Report for your perusal.
For further queries, please feel free to log onto our website: www.iata.org/worldwide/asia_pacific/enquiry. This will enable us to better track and attend to your query more efficiently.
Thank you.
Yours sincerely, Nadya Widjaja Asst. Manager, Customer Service BSP Singapore
